vectors: small utilities users repeatedly search for
exploration_config.non_repetition_check: Non-repetition check performed by varying domain lenses and query families; no leaderboard content used.

trends.name: Offline-First Mobile Usage
trends.description: Users increasingly value apps that work without internet connectivity, especially for travel and productivity
trends.evidence: 86% of Americans have removed apps due to unreliable performance when connectivity is poor. Apps like Google Maps offline downloads show strong user demand.

trends.name: Simplification Over Feature Creep
trends.description: Users prefer simple, focused apps over complex multi-feature platforms
trends.evidence: Grocery list apps with too many features get 1-star reviews: 'too much control, perhaps, for the casual shopper'. Piano learning apps with complex progressions leave beginners 'lost if you don't know what to focus on next'.

trends.name: Parent-Friendly Tools
trends.description: Parents want simple tools that don't require extensive setup or maintenance
trends.evidence: Reward chart apps fail because 'many require a time-consuming set-up, and parents tend to quit halfway through'. Parents want apps that are 'easy to use' and don't overwhelm busy schedules.

market_research.monetization_trends: Users accept subscriptions for consistently useful utilities, especially when apps provide ongoing value like updated content or cloud sync features

app_ideas.name: SimpleStock
app_ideas.signal_source: App Store reviews for pantry apps show users want 'simple barcode scanner' functionality without overwhelming features. One user: 'worth trying at the free level with scanner that works great'
app_ideas.description: Offline pantry inventory tracker with barcode scanning. Discovery Mode: Practical Utility. Ship Profile: Client-only. Simple interface for tracking what's in your pantry, fridge, and freezer with expiration reminders.
app_ideas.target_user: Busy households who want to reduce food waste and avoid duplicate purchases
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Users report 'throwing out food is throwing out money' and need simple tracking without complex meal planning features that add confusion
core_loop: Get notifications for items about to expire
app_ideas.differentiation: Focuses solely on inventory tracking without meal planning complexity. Works completely offline with simple barcode database.
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium features include unlimited items (free version caps at 50), cloud backup, and household sharing

app_ideas.name: PackEasy
app_ideas.signal_source: PackPoint users complain: 'app has seriously become useless' due to data loss and forced list creation. Users want 'backup features' and reliable list persistence.
app_ideas.description: Simple offline packing checklist app with reliable data persistence. Discovery Mode: Practical Utility. Ship Profile: Client-only. Creates customizable packing lists that never disappear.
app_ideas.target_user: Frequent travelers frustrated with unreliable packing apps
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Current apps have 'zero entries even though there was one before closing the app' and 'all my customized lists were gone forever' after crashes
app_ideas.differentiation: Guarantees data persistence with automatic local backups. No forced list creation screens or complex weather integration.
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Pro features include unlimited lists, cloud sync across devices, and custom categories

app_ideas.name: PianoDaily
app_ideas.signal_source: Piano app users report 'some beginner lessons feel intermediate' and 'lack of structure a little overwhelming'. Need for 'proper technique guidance' without complexity.
app_ideas.description: Simplified piano practice companion with clear daily structure. Discovery Mode: Learning Practice. Ship Profile: Client-only. Focuses on technique fundamentals and consistent practice habits.
app_ideas.target_user: Adult beginners who tried complex piano apps and felt overwhelmed
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Users get 'lost if you don't know what to focus on next' and want apps that are 'challenging but not overwhelming'
app_ideas.differentiation: Linear progression designed for true beginners. No song library complexity, focuses on fundamentals and technique.
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Advanced lessons, technique videos, and progress analytics behind subscription

app_ideas.name: VisualBell
app_ideas.signal_source: Parents want 'simple timer apps with large, easy-to-read displays' and complain about timer apps with 'too many customization options' that are confusing for kids.
app_ideas.description: Simple visual countdown timer for kids activities. Discovery Mode: Kids/Family. Ship Profile: Client-only. Large, colorful timer display with customizable alerts for routines.
app_ideas.target_user: Parents of children ages 4-10 who need routine structure
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Parents need 'one-tap timer starting' and 'clear visual or audio alerts' without navigating 'multiple menus'
core_loop: Set timer duration with simple controls
app_ideas.differentiation: Designed specifically for children with large buttons, bright colors, and no complex settings menu
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Premium themes, additional sound options, and multiple timer presets for different activities

app_ideas.name: CameraLingo
app_ideas.signal_source: Google Translate users frustrated: 'automatically blocks out the original texts' and other apps 'make you upgrade after ONE translation'. Need for reliable offline camera translation.
app_ideas.description: Offline camera text translator with local language packs. Discovery Mode: Practical Utility. Ship Profile: Offline-first. Translate text from photos without internet connection.
app_ideas.target_user: Travelers and international students who need reliable translation without data costs
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Existing apps 'made me watch 5 different ads' and 'translated it to Spanish' when Italian was expected. Users need apps that 'work with any accuracy and consistency'
app_ideas.differentiation: Completely offline operation with pre-downloaded language models. No ads interrupting translation flow.
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Additional language packs, higher accuracy models, and text-to-speech pronunciation

app_ideas.name: QuickSounds
app_ideas.signal_source: Soundboard users hate 'pop ups every 5 seconds' and 'TWO 15-30 second ads that you can't skip'. Want simple soundboards where 'not a single one of them would play anything' is fixed.
app_ideas.description: Ad-free meme soundboard with guaranteed playback. Discovery Mode: Playful/Meme. Ship Profile: Client-only. Curated collection of popular internet sounds and memes with instant playback.
app_ideas.target_user: Social media users and gamers who want quick access to meme sounds
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Users frustrated when 'sound effects stopped working completely' and apps become 'completely unusable' due to excessive advertising
app_ideas.differentiation: No ads interrupting sound playback. All sounds guaranteed to work with local storage.
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Weekly updated sound packs, custom upload feature, and unlimited favorites

app_ideas.name: ListLite
app_ideas.signal_source: Users prefer apps described as 'plain and simple app that leaves you in control. It's like a blank piece of lined paper' over apps with 'too much control' and 'steeper learning curves'.
app_ideas.description: Minimal grocery list app focused on simplicity. Discovery Mode: Practical Utility. Ship Profile: Client-only. Just a digital notepad optimized for shopping lists with smart suggestions.
app_ideas.target_user: Shoppers who find current grocery apps too complicated
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Users complain about apps that 'auto-populate a new item' and have 'little things that just irritate me' with unnecessary features
app_ideas.differentiation: Eliminates all complex features like meal planning, coupons, and store maps. Pure shopping list functionality.
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Cloud sync across devices, shared family lists, and unlimited list history

pricing.trial_strategy: Free with single list, no sync

app_ideas.name: StarChart
app_ideas.signal_source: Parents say reward chart apps 'require a time-consuming set-up, and parents tend to quit halfway through'. Need apps that are 'easy to use' without overwhelming features.
app_ideas.description: Simple digital star chart for kids with minimal setup. Discovery Mode: Kids/Family. Ship Profile: Client-only. Visual progress tracking without complex goal management.
app_ideas.target_user: Parents of children ages 3-8 who want simple behavior tracking
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Parents want to 'see ALL goals listed altogether under one child rather than having to swipe to each one' and avoid apps that are 'very check-list based'
app_ideas.differentiation: One-screen interface showing all children and tasks. No complex reward systems or elaborate customization.
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Multiple children support, progress history, and printable certificates

app_ideas.name: QuickCapture
app_ideas.signal_source: Users need apps for 'capture information quickly' that work offline. Note apps should focus on 'getting ideas down fast' without complex organization features that slow down capture.
app_ideas.description: Ultra-fast note capture app optimized for speed. Discovery Mode: Practical Utility. Ship Profile: Offline-first. Open app, type, automatically saved. No folders or categories.
app_ideas.target_user: Busy professionals and students who lose ideas while opening complex note apps
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Users lose thoughts while navigating through folder structures and organization systems in traditional note apps
app_ideas.differentiation: Optimizes for capture speed over organization. Zero-friction note creation with powerful search for retrieval.
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Cloud sync, voice transcription, and unlimited note storage

app_ideas.name: DotTracker
app_ideas.signal_source: Users want 'simple habit tracking' without 'overwhelming workflows' that make tracking feel like work itself. Need visual progress that motivates without complexity.
app_ideas.description: Minimalist habit tracker using simple dot marking. Discovery Mode: Practical Utility. Ship Profile: Client-only. Visual calendar grid where you mark completed habits with colored dots.
app_ideas.target_user: People who abandoned complex habit tracking apps but want simple progress visualization
app_ideas.pain_point_evidence: Habit tracking apps often have 'too many features' and users want something that 'doesn't feel like another task to manage'
app_ideas.differentiation: No analytics, no complex metrics, no reminders. Pure visual tracking inspired by physical dot journals.
app_ideas.subscription_fit: Multiple habit categories, yearly view, and progress photos
